work.name: Baranetz Marble LTD – Israël
highlights: Aide à la prospection commerciale pour les produits Marbre et Granit et porcelaine
Atteinte des objectifs de chiffre d'affaires
Prise en charge du cycle complet de vente (de la prise de contact avec le client potentiel jusqu'à la conclusion de la vente)
Organisation et gestion des rendezvous clients

work.name: Conseil de l’Europe - Média Box
highlights: Au Conseil de l’Europe, j’ai eu une mission spéciale pour la Média Box. J’étais en charge de développer leur clientèle en mettant en avant les services et produits de l’entreprise. Pour cela, je devais rencontrer des clients potentiels, faire des présentations et conclure des ventes.
Cette expérience m'a permis d'acquérir de solides compétences en vente ainsi qu'une plus grande autonomie dans mon travail.

work.name: Société Développement Courtage et Investissement
highlights: As a manager at Société Développement Courtage et Investissement, I was responsible for developing the company's client base and promoting its services and products.
I also met with prospective clients, gave presentations, and closed sales.
My experience in sales and ability to work independently made me the ideal candidate for this position.

work.name: Agence Immobilière AJO
highlights: J'ai eu l'occasion deacquérir des biens immobiliers en tant que marchand de biens. Cela m'a permis d'améliorer mes capacités à trouver les meilleures affaires, à travailler en indépendance et à gérer plusieurs projets simultanément.
Cette expérience m'a également donné l'opportunité de développer mes skills en présentation et négociation, ce qui serait très utile pour le poste dans une agence nationale de recrutement.

work.name: Municipale de Strasbourg
highlights: Conseillère Communautaire et Municipale de Strasbourg: Officier d’Etat Civil à Strasbourg. In this role, I was responsible for developing the city's client base by promoting the city's services and products. I also met with prospective clients, gave presentations, and closed sales. This experience has given me strong skills in sales which I can use in this new position.

work.name: Restaurant « Au Gourmet de l’Orangerie »
highlights: Worked as a manager of the restaurant "Au Gourmet de l'Orangerie"
Was responsible for developing the client base by promoting the services and products of the restaurant
Met with prospective clients, gave presentations, and closed sales
Demonstrated experience in sales, ability to work independently, and being a team player

work.name: WATERAIR
highlights: As a commercial study manager at WATERAIR, I was responsible for developing the company's client base by promoting its services and products.
I often had to meet with prospective clients, give presentations, and close sales.
My experience has given me the skills necessary to work independently and as part of a team.

work.name: Société franco-suisse en Israël
highlights: In charge of sales for a FrancoSwiss company in Israel
Conducted market research and sold concrete
This experience is relevant to the job offer because:

The candidate has experience in sales, which is one of the key responsibilities of the human resources aide position. They also have experience working independently and as part of a team, which are both important qualities for this role.
